messages.subject: Re: [UnschoolingDiscussion] Re: reading/other languages
messages.msgSnippet: ... luckymermaid@sbcglobal.net writes: I have four children and I try to be and unschooler, like follow their lead rd time reading out loud to any of  my
messages.messageBody:
>>>>>>In a message dated 2/5/2004 2:09:19 PM Eastern Standard Time,
luckymermaid@... writes:
I have four children and I try to be and unschooler, like follow their lead
rd time reading out loud to any of my children for one big
reason and that is because English is my second language and I have a heavy
accent. <<<<<<

I'd say read books to them in your OWN language. They'll pick up the English
from around them. They're surrounded by it!

Let them HEAR your wonderful mother tongue, and WOW everyone with your
children's abilities in TWO languages!

~Kelly


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
